resources.string:
Giraffe is a personal conference schedule planner for Android.

2011 (c) Andreas Gohr
splitbrain.org/go/giraffe

Usage:

1. Choose "iCal Url" from the options menu.
2. Enter the URL to an .ics iCal file.
3. Click (re)load data.

Sessions can be marked as favorite by clicking the Giraffe icon. Session details are available by a click on its name. Use the icons at the top to filter for favorites and future sessions only.
Enter the iCal URL of the conference schedule in the field above.
